name: SlayingDjangoNdReact
description: install code have pip3 and python3  pip3 install pipenv pipenv shell (Make a new venv) pipenv install django djangorestframework django-rest-knox django-admin startproject projectName python manage.py startapp appName Under project in setting.py add rest_framework and all others apps in INSTALLED_APPS  Make a model in your app.... afterwards run python manage.py makemigrations appname python manage.py migrate make a serliazer.py and api.py file in your app In serializer add your fields you want to seralize and send as json ..... can do '___all__' by making a class and inside it extends Meta
